name: Hyngan
description:
Action Hack & Slash where your weapons break after hitting enemies.

Recommended use of Xbox Controller.

Created by Guillermo Meléndez & Álvaro Ortuño.

Twitter:

https://twitter.com/Guillemg15

https://twitter.com/ClekioGD

Details:

3 Levels.

3 Different Types of Enemies.

1 Big Bad Boss per Level.
